name: glass engine: a miniscule sci-fi dramedy (v0.1)
name_original: glass engine: a miniscule sci-fi dramedy (v0.1)
description:
an neo-archeologist working the late shift uncovers an remnant a.i. from a forgotten civilization. things get kind of weird from there.

this game is currently in a very early stage (i didn't get to work on it as often as i hoped during the submission period) but i wanted to get something out before the deadline!! i hope u like what's here so far and i DO plan to expand on this don't worry!

current # of endings: 1

inspired by the cart Glass Engine by Dylan Wells and Relic studio -- you can find the original cart here: https://famicase.com/21/softs/181.html
